text: Ara allahâ€Œra ebadata karo, ara tamra sathe an'ya kichu sarika karo na, ara pitamatara prati sadaya acarana karo, ara nikataâ€Œtmiyadera prati, ara etimadera ara misakinadera, ara nikata samparkera pratibesira, ara parakiya pratibesira, ara parsbabarti sathira, ara pathacarira, ara yake tomadera dana hata dhare rekheche. Nihsandeha allah bhalobasena na take ye dambhika, garbita
